home.about_content: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Engineering at Sup GalilÃ©e, I am developing comprehensive expertise in software engineering, computer systems, and cybersecurity. My academic journey has equipped me with strong technical skills in programming (C, Python, Java), system administration, and information security. I am currently completing my work-study program at Abeille Assurances as an IAM-Cybersecurity apprentice, where I focus on implementing and administering IAM and PAM solutions. Passionate about emerging technologies, I also develop personal projects and maintain my own server to host my applications. This portfolio showcases my technical achievements, professional experiences, and the articles I write about the technologies I explore and master.
